third.title: Some companies already attracting talent with Refy.

first.title: Create a rewards program based on loyalty points*.
first.hint: *Optional depending on your referral program settings.
first.text-1: Salary reward referral programs work, but because they are usually rewarded only per recruit, team participation is less than you might expect.
first.text-2: With Refy you can create a referral plan that also rewards for sharing the offer on Linkedin, recommending a candidate or sharing publications that promote the employer brand.
first.text-3: Team members can exchange points for rewards according to the company's strategy: vacation days, telecommuting days, t-shirts or whatever you can think of.

second.title: Full traceability: a unique offer link for each team member.
second.text-1: One of the keys to a comprehensive referral program is having good traceability of shared offers.
second.text-2: In Refy, each member of the team can share their unique offer links with their network of contacts. This will allow you to know who has the greatest reach or who make the most effort to spread your offers.
second.text-3: Also, when a candidate applies to the offer through the link, we will know who the referrer has been and we will send him the application so that he can decide if he wants to recommend it or not.

third.title: Filter candidates by creating questions for your team members
third.text-1: Since you're going to get a nice reward, we're going to ask the team members to help us a little filter candidates, right?.
third.text-2: In Refy you can create questions not only for candidates, but also for team members: if the candidate shares the cultural values ​​of the company, their level of English or their expected salary range.
third.text-3: In the end, it's not just about attracting candidates, but getting the whole team involved in attracting quality profiles and optimizing the selection process

fourth.title: We are 100% integrated with your ATS.
fourth.text-1: We integrate with your Applicant Tracking System (ATS) so Refy doesn't add extra workload to you.
fourth.text-2: When you post an offer to your ATS, we'll automatically post it to Refy for your employees to see.
fourth.text-3: In the same way, when a new candidate is recommended, we will send it to your ATS so that you can manage it properly.
fourth.text-4: What if you don't have ATS? It's okay, you can easily manage Refy applications

fifth.title: Keep your employees 100% connected via Teams or Slack
fifth.text-1: Keeping the team connected to the referral program is critical to its success. And where is the team? Right, in Teams or Slack.
fifth.text-2: In Refy you can connect your company chat application so that it notifies the team when you create a new job offer, a post, or when an employee receives a new recommendation request
fifth.text-3: In short, let Refy take care of the communication between the company and the team so that you don't have to do any extra work
